articles.title: Ariana Grande emotionally begs fans to stop commenting on her changing body - indy100
articles.description: Ariana Grande has released an emotional video message for fans, begging them to stop commenting on her weight.The singer rarely appears publicly, and fans have noticed the star getting thinner in recent months - but she insists it's her turning things around.…
articles.content:
